jd: From: Nitish Kumar, Quantum World Technologies Inc nitish.kumar@quantumworldit.com Reply to: nitish.kumar@quantumworldit.com HelloHope you are doing well today!!!Position: Java DeveloperLocation: Maclean virigina (F2F Interview)Duration: Long term ContractPlease share me only local profiles F2F Interview RequiredJob Description:Role name:DeveloperRole Description:o 6-8 years of experience in Kotlin/React JSo Strong computer science fundamentals: data structures, algorithms, and OOP programming.o Good knowledge of Coding standards and code structureso An excellent understanding of best practices for concurrency and threading.o Expert-level knowledge of Kotlin 1.4.10 and above; React JS 16.0 & above.o Strong knowledge of data analysis and processing algorithms.o Experience developing highly performant and readable Kotlin code and the ability to diagnose performance bottlenecks.Thanks & Regards,Nitish KumarSr. Technical RecruiterQuantum World Technologies IncNitish.kumar@quantumworldit.com
